name: restreamer
description: Restreamer is a self-hosted video streaming server that allows live streaming from RTMP, SRT, or WebRTC sources. It offers transcoding, recording, and multi-platform streaming via a clean web UI.
features: Multi-protocol input: Accept streams from RTMP, SRT, WebRTC, and HTTP sources.
Live transcoding: Convert video formats and resolutions in real-time for different platforms.
Multi-platform streaming: Broadcast simultaneously to YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, and custom RTMP servers.
Recording: Save live streams to disk for later playback or archival.
Web UI: Configure and monitor streams through an intuitive browser-based interface.
Overlay support: Add logos, text, or images to streams before broadcasting.
Audio mixing: Combine multiple audio sources or add background music to streams.
Adaptive bitrate: Generate multiple quality levels for viewers with different bandwidth.
Stream monitoring: View real-time statistics on bitrate, viewers, and stream health.
Scheduled streaming: Start and stop broadcasts automatically at configured times.
Authentication: Protect streams with password or token-based access control.
Low latency: Minimize delay between capture and playback for interactive streaming.
